markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are impermanent.

Seeing this … They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”

SN.35.223. Ajjhattāyatanadukkhasutta (“The Interior as Suffering”)
